db:abstract.db:para: The QSGSimpleTextureNode class is provided for convenience to easily draw textured content using the QML scene graph.

db:warning.db:para: The simple texture node class must have a texture before being added to the scene graph to be rendered.

This utility class is only functional when running with the default or software backends of the Qt Quick scenegraph. As an alternative, prefer using QSGImageNode via QQuickWindow::createImageNode(). However, this standalone class is still useful when used via subclassing and the application knows that no special scenegraph backends will be involved.

db:section.db:title: enum QSGSimpleTextureNode::TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag
db:section.db:para: The TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag enum is used to specify the mode used to generate texture coordinates for a textured quad.

db:td.db:para: Texture coordinates are oriented with window coordinates i.e. with origin at top-left.
Texture coordinates are inverted in the horizontal axis with respect to window coordinates
Texture coordinates are inverted in the vertical axis with respect to window coordinates

db:section.db:para: The TextureCoordinatesTransformMode type is a typedef for QFlags<TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag>. It stores an OR combination of TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag values.

db:section.db:title: QSGSimpleTextureNode::QSGSimpleTextureNode()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new simple texture node

db:section.db:title: [override virtual noexcept] QSGSimpleTextureNode::~QSGSimpleTextureNode()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the texture node

db:section.db:title: QSGTexture::Filtering QSGSimpleTextureNode::filtering() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the filtering currently set on this texture node

db:section.db:title: bool QSGSimpleTextureNode::ownsTexture() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the node takes ownership of the texture; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QRectF QSGSimpleTextureNode::rect() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the target rect of this texture node.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setFiltering(QSGTexture::Filtering filtering)
db:section.db:para: Sets the filtering to be used for this texture node to filtering.
For smooth scaling, use QSGTexture::Linear; for normal scaling, use QSGTexture::Nearest.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setOwnsTexture(bool owns)
db:section.db:para: Sets whether the node takes ownership of the texture to owns.
By default, the node does not take ownership of the texture.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setRect(const QRectF &r)
db:section.db:para: Sets the target rect of this texture node to r.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setRect(qreal x, qreal y, qreal w, qreal h)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the rectangle of this texture node to begin at (x, y) and have width w and height h.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setSourceRect(const QRectF &r)
db:section.db:para: Sets the source rect of this texture node to r.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setSourceRect(qreal x, qreal y, qreal w, qreal h)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the rectangle of this texture node to show its texture from (x, y) and have width w and height h relatively to the QSGTexture::textureSize.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setTexture(QSGTexture *texture)
db:section.db:para: Sets the texture of this texture node to texture.
Use setOwnsTexture() to set whether the node should take ownership of the texture. By default, the node does not take ownership.

db:warning.db:para: A texture node must have a texture before being added to the scenegraph to be rendered.

db:section.db:title: void QSGSimpleTextureNode::setTextureCoordinatesTransform(QSGSimpleTextureNode::TextureCoordinatesTransformMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Sets the method used to generate texture coordinates to mode. This can be used to obtain correct orientation of the texture. This is commonly needed when using a third party OpenGL library to render to texture as OpenGL has an inverted y-axis relative to Qt Quick.

db:section.db:title: QRectF QSGSimpleTextureNode::sourceRect() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the source rect of this texture node.

db:section.db:title: QSGTexture *QSGSimpleTextureNode::texture() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the texture for this texture node

db:section.db:title: QSGSimpleTextureNode::TextureCoordinatesTransformMode QSGSimpleTextureNode::textureCoordinatesTransform() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the mode used to generate texture coordinates for this node.
